Name: The Living Statue
Description: Hewn from Marble, Steel, or Stone, this once art-piece now roams like a man, bent on destroying every last bit of the world around it. Built of no flesh, it is unyielding to all but the fiercest of blows.
Mechanics: Reduces all damage from Strikes and Terrain Effects by 4.
BasicAction:
If outside of melee, steps into melee using a Stride if a Step is not enough. Otherwise, uses the rest of its actions on Stone Fists.

**Step**: 1 Square
**Stride**: 4 Squares

**Stone Fists**: 1 Action. 18 Bash.
AttackCards: Concrete Cannonball | Destroy all terrain features in a 3x3 area around me, then Strike two enemies within 6 for 12 Bash.
Roil and Rumble | Create Difficult Terrain in Starburst 2 centered on me that reduces Stride length of enemies by 2. Strike all enemies in the created terrain for 20 Bash.

Summon Crystal Heart | Create a Crystal Heart in an adjacent empty square. Can be destroyed with a Strike of DC 16.
At the end of every round, repair the Living Statue for 5 health as long as the Crystal Heart lives.
Rock Solid | This Round, increase my damage reduction by 2.

Destructive Divebomb | Step 12 towards the farthest away enemy in the most direct line possible, ignoring and destroying all terrain effects in its way.
Strike all enemies within Starburst 2 of the target or along the line of travel for 5 Bash.
